sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
By the Queene. A proclamation against certaine seditious and schismatical bookes and libels, &c. Proclamations. 1589-02-13 England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I) Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : 1588 [i.e. 1589]
The year in the imprint is according to Lady Day dating. Mainly directed against the Marprelate tracts--STC. The imprint is in 2 settings: 1) with full stop after date; 2) without full stop after date. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.)
By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : 1588 [i.e. 1589]
The year in the imprint is according to Lady Day dating. Mainly directed against the Marprelate tracts--STC. The imprint is in 2 settings: 1) with full stop after date; 2) without full stop after date. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer the Queenes most excellent Maiestie
>>>>>>> imprintparse
